system.description:
You are slippery, shadowy, hard to pin down … and correspondingly deadly. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your esper levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} feature.
  • Half your rogue levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Thought Shield feature.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e-mmv2.mmv2-features.Item.ZH9tbgbWhU0kjy8N]{Imaginary Knife} cantrip. Your spellcasting ability for it is Intelligence.
  • You can choose to have the bonus damage done by your Sneak Attack be psychic damage if you desire.
  • Once per short rest you can teleport up to 60 feet instead of moving. When you teleport using this or any other means, you can choose to arrive in a swirl of shadowy psychic energy, which heavily obscures your space until the end of your turn.
